ValidationRule.description: If the Product is COBRA you must enter a value in Disposition 1
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "COBRA") && ISPICKVAL(Disposition_1__c, "") && RecordType.Name ="Service Support Agency Case" && Not(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Admin"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: when the product on the case is COBRA, require a value in disposition 1
